timeline.message:
Resolve real (indexed) SPs from IdentityProvider

This change hooks the SamlIdentityProvider class up to the
SamlServiceProviderResolver so that we return real registered
service providers during SSO handling

timeline.bodyText: is this TODO about possibly exposing sp defaults in IDP settings?
timeline.author: jkakavas

replies.bodyText: Yes, these should definitely be configurable, and this isn't the place to set them, but I wanted to avoid Yak shaving here.
replies.author: tvernum

timeline.author: jkakavas

replies.bodyText:
No, but we store it in the doc, so I bubbled it up.
We could rip it out entirely instead.
replies.author: tvernum

timeline.bodyText: However, I think this one is old, and shouldn't be here.
timeline.author: tvernum
